title: rework Pantheon
body: please can you rework pantheon Q for rang make it bit long and he's E it weak. to me Pantheon is a fighter not a warrior that hide...Please Riot..thank you..

replies.body: He needs a rework, but not for these reasons. What you've actually proposed is a buff not a rework.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EsHlEYEf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-17T20:35:20.368+0000)
>
> He needs a rework, but not for these reasons. What you've actually proposed is a buff not a rework.

I think his kit is fine.
It's better than Rengar's I guess :D
